name: Beast Slayer (Jhen Mohran)
description:
This is 2-d action rpg where you save earth from multiple beasts that have escaped your planet luckily you are a slayer! Inspired by the wonderful monster hunter series you hunt Beats and upgrade your armor and 5 different weapons you can pick from. One melee and one range at a time. Do you have what it takes to save the world? Time to find out in Beast Slayer!

Instructions:

a to attack and interact with npcs, arrow keys to move, s to save, e to visit the smithy, d to block and if you have the spear d to counter, and finnaly 1 and 2 keys to use items.
